diamond.manager.texture

Interface Texture

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlphaTexture, CubeTexture, NormalTexture, Scene, StandardTexture

    public interface Texture
    Das Interface Texture muss von allen Texturen implementiert werden
    Version:
    0.1 pre-alpha, 2013-02-21
    Author:
    Uwe Wilko Gruenefeld
